name: urbit-merchant-feeds
description: Feeds are one of many methods of delivering product data to the Urb-it platform.
author: Urb-it <teknik@urbit.com>

scripts.gendoc: yarn gendoc:inventory && yarn gendoc:example:inventory --silent && yarn gendoc:products && yarn gendoc:example:products --silent && yarn gendoc:readme
scripts.gendoc:example:inventory: h='### Example Inventory Feed' nl='\n' && c=\`\`\`\ && s=$(cat examples/inventory/inventory.json) && echo "$nl$h$nl$c$nl$nl$s$nl$nl$c$nl" >> docs/7_inventory.md
scripts.gendoc:example:products: h='### Example Product Feed' nl='\n' && c=\`\`\`\ && s=$(cat examples/products/products.json) && echo "$nl$h$nl$c$nl$nl$s$nl$nl$c$nl" >> docs/6_products.md
